# authorName

**Instance Property**

The document’s author.

## Declaration

```swift
var authorName: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Usually, this is the treating physician’s name.

HealthKit automatically extracts the author’s name from the CDA’s XML data.

## Accessing the Document’s Data

- **custodianName**: The name of the organization responsible for the document.
- **documentData**: The CDA document stored as XML data.
- **patientName**: The patient’s name.
- **title**: The document’s title.

items.description: The name of the organization responsible for the document.
